description:

setValue(value)} rgbRedInputScreenReaderLabel="Input field for red" rgbGreenInputScreenReaderLabel="Input field for green" rgbBlueInputScreenReaderLabel="Input field for blue" rgbAlphaInputScreenReaderLabel="Input field for alpha" colorSliderNavigationExplanationScreenReaderLabel={`You are on a color slider. To navigate the slider left or right, use the 'A' and 'D' buttons respectively`} alphaSliderNavigationExplanationScreenReaderLabel={`You are on an alpha slider. To navigate the slider left or right, use the 'A' and 'D' buttons respectively`} colorPaletteNavigationExplanationScreenReaderLabel={`You are on a color palette. elementRef.description: Provides a reference to the component's underlying html element.

onChange.description: Gets called each time the color changes

value.description: Sets the value of the component. If changes, the color changes inside the component as well

withAlpha.description: Toggles alpha. If true, alpha slider will appear

rgbRedInputScreenReaderLabel.description: screenReaderLabel for the RGBA input's red input field

rgbGreenInputScreenReaderLabel.description: screenReaderLabel for the RGBA input's green input field

rgbBlueInputScreenReaderLabel.description: screenReaderLabel for the RGBA input's blue input field

rgbAlphaInputScreenReaderLabel.description: screenReaderLabel for the RGBA input's alpha input field

colorSliderNavigationExplanationScreenRe.description:
screenReaderLabel for the color slider. It should explain how to navigate the slider
with the keyboard ('A' for left, 'D' for right)

alphaSliderNavigationExplanationScreenRe.description:
screenReaderLabel for the alpha slider. It should explain how to navigate the slider
with the keyboard ('A' for left, 'D' for right)

colorPaletteNavigationExplanationScreenR.description:
screenReaderLabel for the color palette. It should explain how to navigate the palette
with the keyboard ('W' for up, 'A' for left, 'S' for down and 'D' for right)
